author: Danielle Berjikian
description:

Rep. Maxwell Frost has found the nerve to claim that ICE is engaging in "human trafficking" for doing what you voted for. However, he failed to acknowledge that open border policies and his ideology are what promote this evil. Thus, his lack of self-awareness is so pathetic that it should be illegal for him to ever run for office in this country.\

Rep. Maxwell Frost (D) says that ICE is carrying out "human trafficking" because they are arresting and deporting criminal illegal alie
title: Zoomer Democrat launches the left's new attack against Trump... claim deporting illegals is "human trafficking"

author: George The Greek
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

I don’t think there’s any way around it. While I applaud Trump’s efforts to end the madness of birthright citizenship for anchor babies and birth tourism, executive orders alone will not cut it. If we want a real solution to the abuse of birthright citizenship Congress needs to pass a law.

Thankfully, Congress has the constitutional authority to end birthright citizenship for anchor babies (children born to illegal immigrants) and birth tourists (foreign nationals who enter the U.S. solely to secure citizenship for their newborns) through targeted legislation. Currently there is a bill introduced in Congress to do just that (
title: To Properly End Birthright Citizenship Abuse, We Need Congress to Pass a Law

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

If you were to believe the media, a) that would be a dunderhead decision on your part, and b) you would believe the Republican Party signed their death warrant by voting for the Big, Beautiful Bill. It's gonna be total annihilation in the midterms! And that was before the Epstein brouhaha! Well, as it turns out, the more people learn the truth about what was passed, the more they like it.

A recent Harvard-Harris poll asked voters, point by point, their views of what's in the Triple B. It appears Trump is on the right side of another 80-20 issue.

title: Democrat narrative gets blown to smithereens as Americans learn more about the Big, Beautiful Bill

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Not unlike entertainment reporters, sports reporters are more concerned with their bitterly partisan political worldview than they are with the topic they are supposed to be covering. However, unlike James Gunn or the cast of Fantastic Four, Pat McAfee is smart enough not to take the bait, as he showed when a journalismer attempted to politicize tonight's MLB All-Star Game.

The game is being hosted by the Atlanta Braves in Atlanta, and if you are starting to have deja vu all over again...
title: Woke reporter tries injecting her politics into MLB All-Star Game, but Pat McAfee refuses to take the bait
